MorphologicalProfilesAnalysis|out
Performs morphological profiles analysis on an input image channel.
Feature Extraction
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|in|Input Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|out|Output Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|channel|Selected Channel|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|1|True
OTBParameterChoice|structype|Structuring Element Type|ball;cross|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|size|Profile Size|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|5|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|radius|Initial radius|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|5|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|step|Radius step|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|1|True
OTBParameterChoice|profile|Profile|opening;closing;derivativeopening;derivativeclosing;openingcharacteristics;closingcharacteristics;classification|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|profile.classification.sigma|Sigma value for leveling tolerance|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|1|True
*QgsProcessingParameterEnum|outputpixeltype|Output pixel type|uint8;int;float;double|False|2|True
